website_summaries.verdict: If you know a unicorn lover who also longs to have their very own pet to care for, this interactive toy covers 2 major wishes in one.
pros: Vet-themed set allows kids to actively nurse Rainglow back to health using the included "medical tools."
2 modes let users alternate between caring for a "sick" unicorn and simply enjoying an interactive petting session
A generous variety of sounds, motion combinations, and facial expressions keep kids guessing
cons: Certain movements can cause audible mechanical sounds

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a day
customer_reviews.text: Would rate this one star but my daughter loves it very much. The reason for the 3 star rating is that ours stopped working in less than a day. At first I had thought the batteries needed to be replaced, but after replacing them with fresh ones, the unicorn never moved. The only thing that happens when you switch it on is the eyes and mouth stay closed shut and there is a musical chime. I can also hear what seems to be the motor struggling to get things going, but it just never moves. I had to order a replacement and will have to swap the broken when my daughter doesnt notice.
customer_reviews.author: Kris R.

customer_reviews.title: M. Recio
customer_reviews.text: Just another toy for the kids to play with 1x and then never play with it again, but hey it’s cute and they just “GOTTA HAVE IT” ...
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Recio

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this one! It’s so interactive and fun, but also teaches your kids about caring for someone/something else. My daughter loves to make her unicorn feel better. A lot of stuff to do with this one, and the unicorn is really interactive and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Abc123

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: love this little baby unicorn! gave to my daughter for her 5th birthday and she a adores him
customer_reviews.author: Abel G Arocha

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, love the interactive quality!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my 6 year old for her birthday. She LOVES this thing. It's fun to interact with by touching its head, nose, and back, or by touching toys to it. I love that it has a "happy playful" mode and a "sick mode" so she can decide how she wants it to interact. Seems sturdy enough. More than I would typically spend on a kids' toy, but she's super happy with it even weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Titus

customer_reviews.title: Christmas toy game-changer
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my God daughter and halfway through opening presents coming out of the second hour of the toys that they were unwrapping she open this up and her eyes were wide open in astonishment. My other niece who is about the same age as her saw the unicorn toy and thought my goddaughter had open up her presents yet she had gotten another cuddle bear and after that all hell broke loose both kids were screaming over this unicorn so bad of advice if you’re going to get this for a child make sure there’s not one of the same age who will also like unicorns that are just the shiny and pretty! Merry Christmas y’all!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Loveable!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who loves this toy more, my daughter or her mom! This Little Rainglow Unicorn was an instant hit! From the moment my daughter unboxed it! Mommy fell in love with it too! They put it to sleep and it snores! Put the bottle in its mouth and it sounds like a baby! Closes and opens its eyes so cute! This is my daughter's best gift this Christmas, even beat the Barbie Dream House!
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Verdi

customer_reviews.title: Batteries run out fast and now toy no longer works after one month. VERY DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it, however the batteries run out very quickly. Now shes had it a month and the thing stopped working. Very dissapointed for a toy i paid $50 for.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unique gift for girls who just love unicorns
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! I was delighted by how fun this is for our little girl. Very interactive, you can hear a heart beat, feed the uncikrn put bandaid on boo-boos and it has a response for all of that. This was a perfect option for little girls who love unicorns versus the standard puppy/kitten vet kits. Also purchased as a gift for another girl after our daughter got for Christmas and she loves it just as well.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: cute but thought i got it as lighting deal for $40 NOW regualr $ 30??
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a nice toy, but I bought it in October thinking WOW a lighting deal for $39.99 so I hurried to buy for my niece for Christmas, she loves unicorns!!! THOUGHT I got a good deal BUT NOW ITS ONLY $30.00 REGULAR PRICE. makes me wonder how good of a toy it really is since the price cut. I feel not so excited thinking I got a LIGHTING DEAL. Should of waited for this price
customer_reviews.author: mcquay5

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy, keeps kids busy for hours!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old absolutely loves this adorable unicorn! I’ve never seen her play so long with one toy. She loves helping it feel better. My almost 2 year old loves it as well! He likes giving it the bottle and thermometer. Very well made, everything is quality about this set, no cheap plastic. I feel like it will last for a long time. Such a sweet and fun toy that all kids will enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Unicorns are real.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted a real unicorn for Christmas. This was a wonderful way to fulfill that wish. She went crazy for this. She four and just adores the unicorn. It was her favorite toy. The best toy is the one the child adores and will play with and my granddaughter plays with this for hours. Score one for grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Fun initially
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to have some glitches, unicorn doesn’t always respond to “treatments” and can be hard to turn on. My four year old enjoys it, but it isn’t a favorite go-to toy like I thought it would be. My daughter likes the pieces that Come with it and uses them with other toys too.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who loves animals & wants to be a vet. Seemed perfect. She hardly seems to play with this & it stays in her room. Wasn't too sure about this item based on the picture of the facial expression on the unicorn but the reviews got me. Expensive lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Cindee L

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fun to heal when sick
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I was expecting. Super cuddley. My 7 year old loves this toy and likes to get the light up unicorn horn back to green so feeling better again when in the “sick” mode. The face movements and talking are really good and not creepy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Who opened this up? - stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: Its what my daughter wanted. But upon arrival it was in a plastic bag and the packaging was all ripped apart and open. All the “vet set pieces” were loose. UPDATE: I should have bought it from Walmart or something —-batteries changed but it is no longer working. Terrible purchase for such a exciting Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: MZimm

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Our child got it as a Christmas present. It has worked a month and now will not turn on move or anyting. We have tried changing the battery several times. Try different settings as well. It will not work and we've only had it a month. I tried to get into contact with both of manufacture and the seller without any luck. Our 3yr old is crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 1st grader niece that became her instant love!! It is a great gift for a little girl that might still like imaginary play (like playing dr or vet) and is into those girly unicorns. She even sleeps with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carly R.

customer_reviews.title: Makes ama good gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter opened this as part of her xmas gifts.. She loved it. It was the first one she wanted to open. It is a good little plushie that interacts. It gets repetitive but she liked it so i guess its okay for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Jackssand

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for five year old girl!
customer_reviews.text: This was such an AMAZING Christmas present. Very interactive. She was able to play doctor with her unicorn while interacting with it. You can make it better by turning the unicorn horn a different shade. The heart beats and there are other sounds too.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: five year old loved this
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift for a precious five year old that loves unicorns and pets in general. loves to play vet and nurse her stuffed animals...so win win she loved this gift and that was a gift for me..
customer_reviews.author: bookworm 2

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully Surprised
customer_reviews.text: My kindergartener wanted this so much. I finally gave in and let her use her own gift card to purchase it. I was delightfully surprised with the product. Works well, totally cute and it fascinates multiple ages. My daughter drags it everywhere. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hanley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Some of the “medications” are a bit difficult for my 2-year-old to “administer.” I saw the age recommendation; I just don’t think it’d hold her attention when she’s 3 or above. It’s a simple product, and does a good job otherwise. No problems with quality, or shipping.
customer_reviews.author: DonkeyBelly

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pretend Play For All Ages!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 year old grand daughter for Christmas after she eyed it in the store. She loves all things unicorn & pretend play. My 5 year old & 2 1/2 year old grandsons liked it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: This beauty has cost me my sanity. She calls it her baby unicorn. She feeds it. She takes it everywhere. She hides it in her school bag when it is time for school. She absolutely adores this thing. Best buy for the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste ur money.
customer_reviews.text: So i got this for my daughter and it turns on and whines for 3 sec and then it goes back off it doesnt interact with any of the vet tools because it shuts off after 3 secs what a waste of money for it not to do what its supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Expectations exceeded!!
customer_reviews.text: My best purchase this Christmas season. This little unicorn has lifelike mannerisms that steal your heart. It puts the caring into the traditional child's doctor kit. The child must care for the unicorn by giving medicine and shots. If done correctly the unicorn horn goes from red to blue. The animal purrs when petted and snores quietly when sleeping. It bats its eyes at your like it is looking right at you. So adorable. An amazing toy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RaS

customer_reviews.title: Love, keep healthily, teaches
customer_reviews.text: Loved it all, bag for accessories would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Omie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So at first seems like it’d be for a younger child however my daughters 10 and I got this for her for Christmas and she hasn’t stopped playing with her.
customer_reviews.author: Holly willey

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to replace all four batteries~!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just got to experience the "try me" mode, then she thought her unicorn had died but turns out we weren't replacing all four batteries :) So much fun but doesn't really do that much. Soft enough to cuddle!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Very interactive
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to find this for half the price as the store we saw it in initially. Arrived next day and before Christmas. My daughter is obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.author: CMRS123

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos love it
customer_reviews.text: To me it is corney, but most importantly, to my daughter, she loves it. She is 7 and wants to be a veterinarian. Well, a sick unicorn always needs a vet in training.
customer_reviews.author: Martini81

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Beautiful eyes that open and close in a way that makes me think fondly of a Husky I used to have. Its motor is a bit loud, but it’s easily overlooked because of the cute!!! My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to be honest.... this is a really weird looking unicorn. I'm not sure how my daughter really feels about it, but she does play with it often. The accessories are cute and the unicorn itself seems to be a really good quality toy.

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: We picked this up on a flash deal. My daughter absolutely loves it and loves to play vet with the unicorn and her other stuffed friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Guess I bought a dud. The toy lit up and made sounds for the first few hours after giving it to my daughter for her 5th birthday. By the next it would work sometimes if I turned it on and off. Replaced the batteries with new ones and it worked for about an hour after that. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TheGuilty1

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but definitely for a household with no small children.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, fun, and it was pretty reasonable when I purchased this toy (30$). My daughter LOVED it, but her 2 yo brother got a hold of it and broke it 🙄 that is all, because we had it for a week. Lol
customer_reviews.author: RHKarteus

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughyer loved it. I got it for a great price during Black Friday and i am bery happy with how much my daughter plays with her unicorn.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth ruiz

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun, but it doesn’t sit up. The way it’s made, the weight is off balance. It is awkward. The toys functions are fun, but it’s not very easy to use because of the above mentioned issues. I would still probably buy it again, but the price point is a little high for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: April Rau

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo was excited for this. Works as described and just as creepy as I imagined it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D.

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter loves this toy! Fun interactions that keep her imagination going! Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 year olds birthday she has not put it down and has been sleeping with it she absolutely loves it! It’s super cute and she loves feeding it ! Great price compared to other places
customer_reviews.author: Ncarico

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for price!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gifted, yet, as it was purchased as a Christmas gift, but COMPLETELY disappointed to see the price plummet 25%ish, ($40 to $30,) of the price I paid in October. The 2 star rating is because the toy looks it will be nice, but evidently the value leaves more to be desired..
customer_reviews.author: Maggie McColpin

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for an 8 year old girl, she loves this unicorn toy . She can feed,give it medicine and it has emotions when the unicorn wants something. Great gift.

customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter was very excited to receive this toy. It was a definite hit.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for any little kid that loves playing doctor and unicorns
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for gifts. I was unsure at first because of some reviews, but ours works great. It's very soft, moves, talks and lights up. Amazon is also way cheaper for this than in any store I've noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Expression changes. Well made
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter said I love it. The sweetest facial expressions. We'll be ordering more for gifts.

customer_reviews.title: Cute

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Vet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with unicorns so I bought it without her asking for one and she loves it!! If your child likes unicorns this is a great product to buy. You will not be disappointed and neither will your child.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! I bought it for my 5 year old daughter for Christmas and she ABSOLUTELY loves it! You can switch the unicorn to happy or healthy and when my daughter isn't playing with it she turns it off and sleeps with it at night. Definitely worth the buy if you know a child that loves unicorns!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good product, little pricey though
customer_reviews.text: The head isn't soft, but it does move, so it makes sense. Our daughter loves the thing. Named it Sparkles and play with him daily.

customer_reviews.title: Makes funny noises
customer_reviews.text: It was a little odd. I was there for two days after my granddaughter opened this. She liked it, and we’ll see for how long.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I think I fell in love with this unicorn just as much as all 3 of our children have! The sounds don't annoy me like I thought they would - they're actually really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit at a birthday party! She loved it and couldn’t wait to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time
customer_reviews.text: As expected, the toy was a nice Christmas gift. My daughter enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Made Christmas so fun.
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. My granddaughter fell in love with Rainglow. It is a wonderful present for her.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a day of playing with it. You can hear the motor or something trying to work but the unicorn does not move. We changed the batteries thinking that was why and nothing helped. We are so sad a disappointed my daughter really liked this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: Such a delight. Daughter who is 3 loves loves this. It’s clever and cozy. Makes noise but is not annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just loves this! She has a bed for it and everything it wakes up and she rocks it back to sleep just the cutest

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got for my niece for her birthday. She loved it. Even had the adults playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Turman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our 5 year old. She loved it! I was impressed with how easy it was to play with and how snuggly the unicorn was. I’m the past, animatronic animals are often heavy and hard even if the fur is soft. This is a very well made toy.
customer_reviews.author: PreschoolMama

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it for about 5 minutes. It looks more like a sock puppet than a unicorn. Just saying.

customer_reviews.title: She'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Funny looking little creature but my 4yr old daughter loved it so much!

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Really cute toy but doesnt worth the money, for the toy that only makes a few noises, sucks on the bottle, blinks lights 50 something $$ was too much. It didnt keep my daughters attention for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this on her 5th birthday, which is also Christmas, and she ADORED it! It seems to be made really well. I would purchase this as a gift for a friend as well!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter for her birthday and she loves it even I enjoy playing with it with her she loves pretending to be a doctor and this little unicorn makes her playing even more exciting ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Greta Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 4year old goddaughter and she Loved it !!

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for age 4-6
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old niece loved it and her 6 year old sister wanted it too.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: This Was a last minute Christmas splurge that we have loved. This uni orb is adorable. Love the sick mode and healthy mode.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but, creepy
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but honestly a little creepy. The noise it makes sounds like a child making a pony noise.

customer_reviews.title: Uncle of the year!!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece sleeps and goes everywhere with her unicorn.. She loves it. Got here on time as stated and on time for her bday. Thanks a million. Made me uncle of the year!!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Product not working and my daughter already opened with excitement but led to a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Uma Chitbahal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: It was cute at first but it stopped working after only 3 months. It was well taken care of and only used a handful of times before it stopped working. Replaced the 4 batteries and it still does not work.. Daughter is very disappointed..

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Batteries do not fit right, so the toy glitches or doesn't work at all?!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddler!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my three year olds favorite Xmas gifts!!! Gave one to her BFF for her bday and she loves hers as well!!!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought This back in September for a Christmas gift for my Granddaughter. She opened it a few days ago, and it does not work. We’ve tried 3 sets of batteries and nothing.

customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 5 year old daughter. She loves it. So far everything works and has been durable

customer_reviews.text: The cutest unicorn we have! (And we have several.) Snuggle worthy, impresses all ages. Great gift!

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy, it’s so realistic! Money well worth it!

customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. We have bought 2. The first never worked, the second broke a month later (when I can no longer return it). My daughter is really upset as this was a Christmas present.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect faux pet
customer_reviews.text: This was my 5 year old grand daughter's favorite Christmas present. She kept it in her arms all day.

product_meta.title: Little Live Pets Rainglow Unicorn Vet Set - Interactive Pet Unicorn, Multicolor
product_meta.description:
Rainglow the unicorn loves to share mystical adventures with you but sometimes she can feel unwell and needs Your help. With your magical Vet set you can treat rainglow and make her better so that she is a happy and healthy Unicorn again! As you treat rainglow you can see the expression on her face change and her horn glows to show you she is feeling well again! The rainglow Unicorn Vet set comes with many (5) magical accessories to help treat your special patient. Listen with the sparkle scope to hear her heart beat in tune with her horn. Use the thermometer to take her temperature and hear her Sigh! Apply the dream cream to her leg to make her feel better! Wrap The magic bandage around her leg! Feed rainglow magical UNI drops to make her happy and healthy. 
rainglow has two ways to play!
- rainbow mode: your unicorn is healthy, happy and playful>- magical Vet mode: your unicorn is unwell. Use your magical Vet set to treat her and make her better! Rainglow is so interactive with over 40 sounds and reactions! She even comes with her own "get well" Certificate!
feature_bullets: Rainglow is your magical pet unicorn who can sometimes feel unwell. Use rainglow's magical vet set to make her feel better!
See rainglow's expression change on her face as you treat her and make her feel better!
Rainglow's magical unicorn horn lights up and magically changes as she gets better!
The rainglow unicorn vet set includes 5 magical accessories to make your unicorn better!
Rainglow has two modes of play - rainbow mode when your unicorn is happy and healthy. Magical vet mode - treat her to make her feel better!
Rainglow is so interactive! With over 40 sounds and reaction!
